title: 443: “It’s Not Me, It’s You” w/ John Kim (aka The Angry Therapist) & Vanessa Bennett
itunes:title: 443: “It’s Not Me, It’s You” w/ John Kim (aka The Angry Therapist) & Vanessa Bennett
description:
Today The Broads are joined by therapists John Kim (aka The Angry Therapist) and Vanessa Bennett! They chat about how their relationship began, why they wrote their new book “It’s Not Me, It’s You”, defensiveness in a relationships, ownership, relationship attachment styles, healing codependency, and SO much more! 

 

“IT’S NOT ME, IT’S YOU”: 

Purchase book here: https://www.harpercollins.com/products/its-not-me-its-you-john-kimvanessa-bennett?variant=39913484451874

 

JOHN KIM: 

***Follow him on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theangrytherapist/ 

***Listen to “The Angry Therapist” podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-angry-therapist-podcast/id1298703768 

***Website: https://www.theangrytherapist.com/ 

 

VANESSA BENNETT: 

***Follow her on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vanessasbennett/

***Listen to “Cheaper Than Therapy” podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/cheaper-than-therapy-with-vanessa-and-den%C3%A9/id1504710841 

***Website: https://www.vanessabennett.com/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial, plus free postage and a free digital scale at STAMPS.COM with code CHATTY

***FAVOR: Favor is offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient at HEYFAVOR.COM/CHATTY

***ROTHYS; Get $20 off your first purchase at ROTHYS.COM/CHATTY 

***OSEA: Get 10% off your first order sitewide plus free samples with every order, and orders over $50 get free shipping at OSEAMALIBU.COM with promo code CHATTY10 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
